skillTree.name: Eye of the Gods
skillTree.description: The slightest glance, the merest glimpse from one of the Dark Gods is sufficient to propel their playthings to ever-greater feats of desolation.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +80%

skillTree.name: Primordial Masters
skillTree.description: Although corrupt with change and frozen to the very core of their icy hearts, the Frost-Wyrms of the northern wastes are no less vicious for it.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +15 for Frost-Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15 for Frost-Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: King of Trolls
skillTree.description: Brooding upon his rocky throne, Throgg has pledged to fight all comers, with all the monsters of Troll Country at his side.

effects.description:
Control: +2
	(local province)

Leadership: +12 for all Troll, Fimir and Skin Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for all Troll, Fimir and Skin Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Primordial Might
skillTree.description: Despite his aspirations as a ruler, Throgg is no tin tyrant hiding behind foolish legions.

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +3 for "Copious Vomit"
Weapon strength: +15%

skillTree.name: Mutant Regeneration
skillTree.description: The uncanny ability of quickly regenerating even the most grievous wounds; in due course, almost all will be healed.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Horrible Regeneration" for all Troll and Skin Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 20% for Norscan Trolls & Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Passive ability: "Regeneration" for all Fimir units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monstrous Fiends
skillTree.description: Witlessly stupid, yet bone-crushingly powerful. Do not be deceived.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +8 for all Troll, Fimir and Skin Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

Ability: "Frenzy" for Troll and Fimir units
	(Lord's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.name: Dread Retainers
skillTree.description: "What the Gods gifted to me can be gifted to another. I will not be the one mind in a race of blunt, witless animals."

effects.description: Grants powerful retainer Ancillaries that can modify your units
Grants powerful retainer Ancillaries that can modify your units
Grants powerful retainer Ancillaries that can modify your units

skillTree.name: Age of Beasts
skillTree.description: "Von Carstein. The Everchosen. Dead men. Exalted men. In their skin they are all still men. This...will be the Age of the Beast."

effects.description:
Global recruitment duration: -2 turn for all Troll, Fimir and Skin Wolf units
	(factionwide)
Passive ability: "The Chilling Aura"
Attribute: Causes Terror

skillTree.name: Copious Vomit
skillTree.description: "HUUUURGGEHH!!! BLUUUURGGEHH!!! HUUUUUUUURRRRRGGGGGGGGGGEHH!!!"

effects.description: Ability: "Copious Vomit"

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description: Leadership: +6
Leadership: +12

skillTree.name: Quicksilver
skillTree.description: Blink and you die.

effects.description: Speed: +7%
Speed: +15%

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.name: Fearsome Warriors
skillTree.description: Those who do not bend the knee to the Gods of the North soon find all they hold dear obliterated before them.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Beast Slayers
skillTree.description: Delighting in death and suffering, these savage warriors follow their ignoble Lord wherever he goes.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unnatural Selection
skillTree.description: Only the fiercest creatures can survive the frozen north; the strongest are rounded up for war and starved into viciousness, ready for the next battle.

effects.description:
Speed: +6% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +9% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Frostbitten
skillTree.description: The intense cold cuts into the flesh, burning the foe's extremities until they drop off altogether!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hail of Teeth
skillTree.description: The razor-sharp hail of the north is not the only danger in the Norscan sky – its airborne beasts are just as deadly and far less predictable.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monsters of the North
skillTree.description: Giant, deadly, and able to take orders, this Lord’s monstrosities are especially terrifying and lethal.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)
Ability: "Rally!"

skillTree.name: Champions of the North
skillTree.description: In spite of their savage nature, they are possessed of a savage code of conduct and form a loose brotherhood of those considered worthy.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hardened Hunters
skillTree.description: No beast too large, no adversary too great; no quarry - mortal or otherwise - can evade them.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +12% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Icy Wrath
skillTree.description: The intense cold and near-constant darkness of the far north make for a certain kind of killer.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hulks of Death
skillTree.description: The freezing darkness and stunning violence of the far north bring no small solace to those who have lost everything and wish to forget.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 8% for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Stand or Die!
skillTree.description: There can be no turning back for those whose souls are turning black.

effects.description: Ability: "Stand or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.name: Fight or Die!
skillTree.description: There is no other choice. There never was.

effects.description: Ability: "Fight or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

effects.description:
Income from sacking settlements: +3%
	(Lord's army)

Income from sacking settlements: +8%
	(Lord's army)

Income from sacking settlements: +15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5%
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10%
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Norse Resilience
skillTree.description: The bleak, brutal landscape of the far north breeds bloody, warlike tribes in thrall to Chaos' delicious, twisted power.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Swelling of Doom
skillTree.description: Maybe it is the influence of the Dark Gods that has caused the populace to burgeon and proliferate beyond their natural bounds?

effects.description:
Growth: +8
	(local province)

Growth: +20
	(local province)

Growth: +36
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Masters of the Fen
skillTree.description: The Troll King's horde control the wind-whipped hinterlands of Troll Country, and may yet extend their despoiling influence much further afield.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +5 for Fimir Balefiends
	(local province)
Hero capacity: +1 for Fimir Balefiends

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enemy battle reinforcement time: +25%
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%

skillTree.name: Savage Skills
skillTree.description: There's something about the harsh, unforgiving nature of northern life that makes its occupants fight harder and longer than many of their soft, southern equivalents.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +2
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +3
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unnatural Healing
skillTree.description: Something strange - something no scholar really wishes to discover - governs who dies and who lives in the warlike northern wastes.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fuelled by War
skillTree.description: War and glory before the Gods are the determining elements in every decision made; there is nothing else worth living - or dying - for.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -3%
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -6%
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -9%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Spawn of Chaos
skillTree.description: The tendrils (and tentacles!) of the Northern Gods reach down from the poles and far across the world, twisting and corrupting all they touch.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +150
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Monstrous Ruler
backgroundSkills.description: Atypical of his savage, stupid kind, Throgg is possessed of a grim, malevolent cunning that raises him far above his peers.

effects.description:
Control: +1
	(local province)
All units in Throgg's army are immune to all attrition

Chaos Undivided corruption: +2
	(local province)
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
Chaos Undivided corruption: +5
Recruitment cost: -10%
Melee defence: +10
Ability: "The Wintertooth Crown"

items.name: The Wintertooth Crown
items.description: Whether by the crown's own properties, or by the grace of the Dark Gods, all things bestial and savage obey the wearer.

factionEffects.title: Lord of the Monstrous Horde
factionEffects.description: The Troll King is possessed of a grim and malevolent cunning, seeking always to grind the realms of man under his monstrous rule.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 15% for Norscan Troll & Norscan Ice Troll units
Upkeep: -20% for Norscan Troll & Norscan Ice Troll units
